title: Light Blue Heart
description: A light blue heart, frequently used alongside other hearts. Used to represent love, friendship, feelings of warmth, and the color blue.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the light blue heart emoji offers a serene and tranquil visual, rendered with a soft, luminous glow that suggests calmness and peaceful affection. Its gentle curves and smooth gradient of pale blue, enhanced by subtle highlights reflecting realistic lighting, embody a sense of emotional clarity and quiet devotion unique to Apple's polished design. This emoji, appearing with a delicate, almost ethereal quality on Apple devices, is frequently used to express gentle love, support, trust, or a sense of serenity in messages.
